abstracts.cdata!:
This project will entail no new
            construction or development. There will be no primary
            environmental and socio-economic negative impacts. In
            general, the investments will have positive primary and
            secondary impacts in reducing public health risks. At a
            minimum, the project will: a) reduce the degradation of
            municipal infrastructure systems; b) maintain a minimal
            level of operational integrity; c) arrest the declining
            socio-economic and environmental conditions; and d) provide
            a critical contribution to reducing health risks from
            infectious diseases.
